So be confidentâ€¦when it comes to the kind of professional, specialized, hands-on education youâ€™re seeking, you couldnâ€™t have made a better choice.

OUR MISSION

The Mission of Lincoln College of New England is to help students achieve the knowledge, skills, and confidence to succeed in their careers and their communities. The College is a student-centered 21st century learning environment where flexible delivery and scheduling options are provided wherever possible, and where modern technology supports both on-line and on-campus education.

The College fosters and encourages lifelong learning by providing an education that is practical in its application, yet teaches students to use the resources of their own minds. Particular emphasis is placed on the development of the self through discipline, responsibility and strength of expression.

The College provides an education that emphasizes career and technical knowledge, empowers individuals with broad knowledge and transferable skills, and cultivates social responsibility and a strong sense of ethics and values. Through this process, students are made aware of the challenges and opportunities of a global economy.

The College is committed to making a difference in the community of which it is a part. To this end, it encourages and allows faculty, staff, and students to participate in outreach and service programs designed to focus on the competitive challenges of diverse environments, both locally and globally.

OUR VISION

Lincoln College of New England seeks to provide students with the knowledge, skills, and standards of conduct necessary to achieve success in their lifelong pursuits.
